p.k: Besieged colonel John Wayne battles Apache raiders, but his hardest fight is with his own son. Strong western; a fitting finale to John Ford's legendary Cavalry trilogy
68% Army cadets Tom Cruise and Sean Penn go to extreme lengths to protect their academy when it is threatened by local developers. Gripping drama
65% In the synthetic town of Thneedville, a besotted boy takes up a quest to find the last real tree on earth. Animation with the voice of Danny DeVito
81% Drama starring Clint Eastwood as a cantankerous Korean War veteran who reluctantly becomes a hero to his immigrant neighbours
81% Leo DiCaprio stars as the teen conman who led the FBI on a paper chase, with Tom Hanks as the agent on his trail. Real-life caper from Steven Spielberg
63% Eccentric scientist Rick Moranis has some explaining to do after he reduces four children to the size of insects. Can the tiny tots survive long enough
75% Dustin Hoffman plays an out of work actor who, out of desperation, pretends to be a woman to get a part on a soap opera. Classic comedy

81% Leo DiCaprio stars as the teen conman who led the FBI on a paper chase, with Tom Hanks as the agent on his trail. Real-life caper from Steven Spielberg
